newsitem.title: USA: Metastorm files suit vs Gartner Group.
newsitem.headline: Metastorm files suit vs Gartner Group.

text.p: Metastorm Inc said it filed a lawsuit in a U.S. District Court in Washington D.C. against Gartner Group Inc, alleging defamation and libel regarding an article it published in February.

The article Gartner published was titled "Novell Quits the E-forms market: Bad News for InForms users," Metastorm said. Metastorm said its suit alleged Gartner published the article without taking reasonable steps to research the truthfulness of statements contained in the article.
Gartner was not immediately available to comment.
Metastorm said when it learned of the article it contacted Gartner, pointed out allegedly false statements and asked for an immediate retraction.
Metastorm also alleged that neither contact in the original press release announcing the relationship between Metastorm and Novell Inc nor anyone else was contacted before publishing the article.
Metastorm alleged Gartner did not comply with its numerous requests.
InForms is a software development product which automates business processes. Metastorm develops and distributes services and applications which help customers re-engineer business processes.
